create_image_note.description: Create a note containing an embedded image via a public image URL.

props.name: notebook_id
props.description: The notebook to create the image note in.

props.name: section_id
props.description: The section to create the image note in.

props.name: title
props.description: The title of the image note page.

props.name: image_url
props.description: The public URL of the image to embed (must be publicly accessible).

props.name: image_width
props.description: The width of the image in pixels (optional).

props.name: image_alt_text
props.description: Alternative text for the image (for accessibility).

props.name: description
props.description: Optional description text to include with the image.
